F = VL_LBPFLIPLR(F) flips the LBP features F from left to right.

Example

The following instructions return results almost identical assuming that the width of I is exactly divisible by the cell size: 

  F = VL_LBP(FLIPLR(I), 8)
  F_ = VL_LBPFLIPLR(VL_LBP(I), 8)

See also: VL_LBP(), VL_HELP().
